trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventHandler> delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventHandler>委派被定義為<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>事件的<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>類別。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application, as shown in the example for this topic.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>事件<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔案中類別，如本主題的範例所示。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event is raised at the end of page execution if the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.AutomaticSaveEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>結尾的頁面執行就會引發事件，如果<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.AutomaticSaveEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.AutomaticSaveEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A> method automatically determines whether properties that are made up of primitive types, strings, or <xref:System.DateTime> objects have been changed, by checking the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue.IsDirty%2A> property value for each <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue> in the user profile.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A>方法會自動判斷屬性是否構成的基本型別，字串，或<xref:System.DateTime>已變更的物件，藉由檢查<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue.IsDirty%2A>屬性值，每個<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue>使用者設定檔中。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue.IsDirty%2A> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A> method cannot explicitly determine whether a custom class has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A>方法明確地無法判斷是否已變更的自訂類別。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event to determine whether a custom object has been modified and then either continue with the automatic save if the object has been modified or cancel the automatic save if the object has not been modified.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>事件，以判斷是否已經修改自訂物件，然後繼續自動儲存，如果物件已被修改或取消自動儲存，如果未修改的物件。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the automatic profile save operation, set the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A> property to `false` in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event; otherwise, set the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消儲存作業的自動設定檔，設定<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A>屬性`false`中<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>事件; 否則設定<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A>

trans-unit.source: There may be multiple subscribers to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event.
trans-unit.target: 可能有多個訂閱者<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>事件。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> will use the last value that the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A> property is set to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>會使用最後一個值<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A>屬性設定為。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>

trans-unit.source: As a result, it is recommended that you explicitly set the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A> property in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event regardless of whether you are canceling or continuing with the automatic save, as you may need to overwrite the value set by an earlier subscriber.
trans-unit.target: 因此，建議您明確地設定<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>事件，不論您是在取消或繼續自動儲存，因為您可能需要將值覆寫設定較早的 「 訂閱者 」。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.ContinueWithProfileAutoSave%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs creates an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs> class and sets the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.Context%2A> property to the specified <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs 建立執行個體的<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs>類別，並設定<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.Context%2A>為指定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>屬性</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs.Context%2A></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> of the current request.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>目前的要求。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>目前的要求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs> object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs>物件提供的事件資訊至<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>事件的<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>類別。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAutoSaveEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The Context property provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request.
trans-unit.target: 內容屬性可存取<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>目前的要求。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>目前要求

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref> will automatically save the user profile.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref>會自動儲存使用者設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A> method automatically determines whether properties that are made up of primitive types, strings, or <xref:System.DateTime> objects have been changed, by checking the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue.IsDirty%2A> property value for each <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue> in the user profile.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A>方法會自動判斷屬性是否構成的基本型別，字串，或<xref:System.DateTime>已變更的物件，藉由檢查<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue.IsDirty%2A>屬性值，每個<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue>使用者設定檔中。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue.IsDirty%2A> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A> method cannot explicitly determine whether a custom class has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A>方法明確地無法判斷是否已變更的自訂類別。</xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event to determine whether a custom object has been modified and then either continue with the automatic save if the object has been modified or cancel the automatic save if the object has not been modified.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>事件，以判斷是否已經修改自訂物件，然後繼續自動儲存，如果物件已被修改或取消自動儲存，如果未修改的物件。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the automatic profile save operation, set the ContinueWithProfileAutoSave property to `false` in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event; otherwise, set the ContinueWithProfileAutoSave property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消儲存作業的自動設定檔，將 ContinueWithProfileAutoSave 屬性設定為`false`中<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>事件; 否則將 ContinueWithProfileAutoSave 屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>

trans-unit.source: There may be multiple subscribers to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event.
trans-unit.target: 可能有多個訂閱者<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>事件。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> will use the last value that the ContinueWithProfileAutoSave property is set to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>將會使用 ContinueWithProfileAutoSave 屬性設定為最後一個值。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>

trans-unit.source: As a result, it is recommended that you explicitly set the ContinueWithProfileAutoSave property in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving> event whether you are canceling or continuing with the automatic save, as you may need to overwrite the value set by an earlier subscriber.
trans-unit.target: 因此，建議您明確設定 ContinueWithProfileAutoSave 屬性中<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>事件是否正在取消或繼續自動儲存，您可能需要覆寫先前的訂閱者所設定的值。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.ProfileAutoSaving>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref> will automatically save the user profile; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref>會自動儲存使用者設定檔，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
